segments.source_content: import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs'; import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem'; import constants from '@site/core/TabsConstants';

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_a9b642df

segments.source_content: ## Key Concepts

translations.zh-hant: ## 核心概念

segments.source_content: The keys to integrating React Native components into your iOS application are to:

translations.zh-hant: 將 React Native 元件整合至 iOS 應用的關鍵在於：

segments.source_content:
1. Set up React Native dependencies and directory structure.
2. Understand what React Native components you will use in your app.
3. Add these components as dependencies using CocoaPods.
4. Develop your React Native components in JavaScript.
5. Add a `RCTRootView` to your iOS app. This view will serve as the container for your React Native component.
6. Start the React Native server and run your native application.
7. Verify that the React Native aspect of your application works as expected.

translations.zh-hant:
1. 設定 React Native 依賴項與目錄結構
2. 確認應用中將使用的 React Native 元件
3. 透過 CocoaPods 添加這些元件作為依賴項
4. 使用 JavaScript 開發 React Native 元件
5. 在 iOS 應用中添加 `RCTRootView`，該視圖將作為 React Native 元件的容器
6. 啟動 React Native 伺服器並運行原生應用
7. 驗證應用的 React Native 功能是否正常運作

segments.source_content: ## Prerequisites

translations.zh-hant: ## 必要條件

segments.source_content: Follow the guide on [setting up your development environment](set-up-your-environment) and using [React Native without a framework](getting-started-without-a-framework) to configure your development environment for building React Native apps for iOS.

translations.zh-hant: 請先依照[開發環境設定指南](set-up-your-environment)與[無框架使用 React Native](getting-started-without-a-framework)的說明，配置 iOS 版 React Native 應用的開發環境。

segments.source_content: ### 1. Set up directory structure

translations.zh-hant: ### 1. 設定目錄結構

segments.source_content: To ensure a smooth experience, create a new folder for your integrated React Native project, then copy your existing iOS project to a `/ios` subfolder.

translations.zh-hant: 為確保流程順暢，請先為整合專案建立新資料夾，再將現有 iOS 專案複製到 `/ios` 子資料夾中。

segments.source_content: ### 2. Install JavaScript dependencies

translations.zh-hant: ### 2. 安裝 JavaScript 依賴項

segments.source_content: Go to the root directory for your project and create a new `package.json` file with the following contents:

translations.zh-hant: 進入專案根目錄，建立包含以下內容的 `package.json` 檔案：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_08021a08

segments.source_content: Next, install the `react` and `react-native` packages. Open a terminal or command prompt, then navigate to the directory with your `package.json` file and run:

translations.zh-hant: 接著安裝 `react` 與 `react-native` 套件。開啟終端機或命令提示字元，導航至含 `package.json` 的目錄後執行：

segments.source_content:
<Tabs groupId="package-manager" queryString defaultValue={constants.defaultPackageManager} values={constants.packageManagers}>
<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm install react-native
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn add react-native
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_1641af73

segments.source_content: This will print a message similar to the following (scroll up in the installation command output to see it):

translations.zh-hant: 這將顯示類似以下的訊息（請向上滾動安裝命令輸出以查看）：

segments.source_content: > warning "`react-native@0.52.2`" has unmet peer dependency "`react@16.2.0`".

translations.zh-hant: > 警告："`react-native@0.52.2`" 有未滿足的對等依賴項 "`react@16.2.0`"。

segments.source_content: This is OK, it means we also need to install React:

translations.zh-hant: 此為正常現象，表示我們還需安裝 React：

segments.source_content:
<Tabs groupId="package-manager" queryString defaultValue={constants.defaultPackageManager} values={constants.packageManagers}>
<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm install react@version_printed_above
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn add react@version_printed_above
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_abc45ff5

segments.source_content: Installation process has created a new `/node_modules` folder. This folder stores all the JavaScript dependencies required to build your project.

translations.zh-hant: 安裝過程會建立新的 `/node_modules` 資料夾，此資料夾存放專案建置所需的所有 JavaScript 依賴項。

segments.source_content: Add `node_modules/` to your `.gitignore` file.

translations.zh-hant: 請將 `node_modules/` 加入你的 `.gitignore` 檔案。

segments.source_content: ### 3. Install CocoaPods

translations.zh-hant: ### 3. 安裝 CocoaPods

segments.source_content: [CocoaPods](https://cocoapods.org) is a package management tool for iOS and macOS development. We use it to add the actual React Native framework code locally into your current project.

translations.zh-hant: [CocoaPods](https://cocoapods.org) 是 iOS 與 macOS 開發的套件管理工具，我們用它將實際的 React Native 框架代碼本地化加入現有專案。

segments.source_content: We recommend installing CocoaPods using [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/).

translations.zh-hant: 建議使用 [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/) 安裝 CocoaPods。

segments.source_content:
```shell
$ brew install cocoapods
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_7d898a0e

segments.source_content: > It is technically possible not to use CocoaPods, but that would require manual library and linker additions that would overly complicate this process.

translations.zh-hant: > 技術上雖可不使用 CocoaPods，但這將導致需手動添加函式庫與連結器設定，使流程過度複雜化。

segments.source_content: ## Adding React Native to your app

translations.zh-hant: ## 將 React Native 添加至應用

segments.source_content: Assume the [app for integration](https://github.com/austinzheng/swift-2048) is a [2048](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2048_%28video_game%29) game. Here is what the main menu of the native application looks like without React Native.

translations.zh-hant: 假設[待整合應用](https://github.com/austinzheng/swift-2048)是 [2048](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2048_%28video_game%29) 遊戲。下圖為未整合 React Native 時的原生應用主選單畫面。

segments.source_content: ![Before RN Integration](/docs/assets/react-native-existing-app-integration-ios-before.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![整合前畫面](/docs/assets/react-native-existing-app-integration-ios-before.png)

segments.source_content: ### Command Line Tools for Xcode

translations.zh-hant: ### Xcode 命令列工具

segments.source_content: Install the Command Line Tools. Choose **Settings... (or Preferences...)** in the Xcode menu. Go to the Locations panel and install the tools by selecting the most recent version in the Command Line Tools dropdown.

translations.zh-hant: 請安裝命令列工具。在 Xcode 選單中選擇 **Settings... (或 Preferences...)**，進入 Locations 面板後，於 Command Line Tools 下拉選單中選擇最新版本進行安裝。

segments.source_content: ![Xcode Command Line Tools](/docs/assets/GettingStartedXcodeCommandLineTools.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![Xcode 命令列工具](/docs/assets/GettingStartedXcodeCommandLineTools.png)

segments.source_content: ### Configuring CocoaPods dependencies

translations.zh-hant: ### 配置 CocoaPods 依賴項

segments.source_content: Before you integrate React Native into your application, you will want to decide what parts of the React Native framework you would like to integrate. We will use CocoaPods to specify which of these "subspecs" your app will depend on.

translations.zh-hant: 在整合 React Native 至應用前，需先決定要整合框架中的哪些部分。我們將使用 CocoaPods 來指定應用依賴的這些「子規格」(subspecs)。

segments.source_content: The list of supported `subspec`s is available in [`/node_modules/react-native/React.podspec`](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/react-native/React.podspec). They are generally named by functionality. For example, you will generally always want the `Core` `subspec`. That will get you the `AppRegistry`, `StyleSheet`, `View` and other core React Native libraries. If you want to add the React Native `Text` library (e.g., for `<Text>` elements), then you will need the `RCTText` `subspec`. If you want the `Image` library (e.g., for `<Image>` elements), then you will need the `RCTImage` `subspec`.

translations.zh-hant: 支援的 `subspec` 清單可在 [`/node_modules/react-native/React.podspec`](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/react-native/React.podspec) 中找到。這些子規格通常以功能命名。例如，您通常會需要 `Core` 子規格，它會提供 `AppRegistry`、`StyleSheet`、`View` 等核心 React Native 函式庫。如果您想加入 React Native 的 `Text` 函式庫（例如用於 `<Text>` 元素），則需要 `RCTText` 子規格。若需要 `Image` 函式庫（例如用於 `<Image>` 元素），則需 `RCTImage` 子規格。

segments.source_content: You can specify which `subspec`s your app will depend on in a `Podfile` file. The easiest way to create a `Podfile` is by running the CocoaPods `init` command in the `/ios` subfolder of your project:

translations.zh-hant: 您可以在 `Podfile` 檔案中指定應用程式依賴哪些子規格。建立 `Podfile` 最簡單的方式是在專案的 `/ios` 子資料夾中執行 CocoaPods 的 `init` 指令：

segments.source_content:
```shell
$ pod init
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_f155ef1e

segments.source_content: The `Podfile` will contain a boilerplate setup that you will tweak for your integration purposes.

translations.zh-hant: `Podfile` 會包含一個預設設定，您可以根據整合需求進行調整。

segments.source_content: > The `Podfile` version changes depending on your version of `react-native`. Refer to https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/ for the specific version of `Podfile` you should be using.

translations.zh-hant: > `Podfile` 的版本會根據您使用的 `react-native` 版本而異。請參考 https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/ 以取得您應使用的特定 `Podfile` 版本。

segments.source_content:
Ultimately, your `Podfile` should look something similar to this:
[Podfile Template](https://github.com/react-native-community/template/blob/main/template/ios/Podfile)

translations.zh-hant:
最終，您的 `Podfile` 應該類似以下內容：
[Podfile 範本](https://github.com/react-native-community/template/blob/main/template/ios/Podfile)

segments.source_content: After you have created your `Podfile`, you are ready to install the React Native pod.

translations.zh-hant: 建立 `Podfile` 後，您就可以安裝 React Native 的 pod。

segments.source_content:
```shell
$ pod install
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_2f34b0ad

segments.source_content: You should see output such as:

translations.zh-hant: 您應該會看到類似以下的輸出：

segments.source_content:
```
Analyzing dependencies
Fetching podspec for `React` from `../node_modules/react-native`
Downloading dependencies
Installing React (0.62.0)
Generating Pods project
Integrating client project
Sending stats
Pod installation complete! There are 3 dependencies from the Podfile and 1 total pod installed.
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_43cca4d3

segments.source_content: > If this fails with errors mentioning `xcrun`, make sure that in Xcode in **Settings... (or Preferences...) > Locations** the Command Line Tools are assigned.

translations.zh-hant: > 如果因提及 `xcrun` 的錯誤而失敗，請確認在 Xcode 的 **設定...（或偏好設定...）> 位置** 中已指定命令列工具。

segments.source_content: > If you get a warning such as "_The `swift-2048 [Debug]` target overrides the `FRAMEWORK_SEARCH_PATHS` build setting defined in `Pods/Target Support Files/Pods-swift-2048/Pods-swift-2048.debug.xcconfig`. This can lead to problems with the CocoaPods installation_", then make sure the `Framework Search Paths` in `Build Settings` for both `Debug` and `Release` only contain `$(inherited)`.

translations.zh-hant: > 如果您收到類似「_`swift-2048 [Debug]` 目標覆寫了 `Pods/Target Support Files/Pods-swift-2048/Pods-swift-2048.debug.xcconfig` 中定義的 `FRAMEWORK_SEARCH_PATHS` 建置設定。這可能會導致 CocoaPods 安裝問題_」的警告，請確認 `Build Settings` 中的 `Framework Search Paths` 在 `Debug` 和 `Release` 下僅包含 `$(inherited)`。

segments.source_content: ### Code integration

translations.zh-hant: ### 程式碼整合

segments.source_content: Now we will actually modify the native iOS application to integrate React Native. For our 2048 sample app, we will add a "High Score" screen in React Native.

translations.zh-hant: 現在我們將實際修改原生 iOS 應用程式以整合 React Native。在我們的 2048 範例應用程式中，我們將加入一個以 React Native 實作的「高分」畫面。

segments.source_content: #### The React Native component

translations.zh-hant: #### React Native 元件

segments.source_content: The first bit of code we will write is the actual React Native code for the new "High Score" screen that will be integrated into our application.

translations.zh-hant: 我們要編寫的第一段程式碼是新「高分」畫面的實際 React Native 程式碼，它將被整合到我們的應用程式中。

segments.source_content: ##### 1. Create a `index.js` file

translations.zh-hant: ##### 1. 建立 `index.js` 檔案

segments.source_content: First, create an empty `index.js` file in the root of your React Native project.

translations.zh-hant: 首先，在 React Native 專案的根目錄中建立一個空的 `index.js` 檔案。

segments.source_content: `index.js` is the starting point for React Native applications, and it is always required. It can be a small file that `require`s other file that are part of your React Native component or application, or it can contain all the code that is needed for it. In our case, we will put everything in `index.js`.

translations.zh-hant: `index.js` 是 React Native 應用程式的起點，且始終是必需的。它可以是一個小檔案，僅 `require` 其他屬於您 React Native 元件或應用程式的檔案，也可以包含所需的所有程式碼。在我們的案例中，我們會將所有內容放在 `index.js` 中。

segments.source_content: ##### 2. Add your React Native code

translations.zh-hant: ##### 2. 加入您的 React Native 程式碼

segments.source_content: In your `index.js`, create your component. In our sample here, we will add a `<Text>` component within a styled `<View>`

translations.zh-hant: 在您的 `index.js` 中建立元件。在我們的範例中，我們將在一個帶有樣式的 `<View>` 中加入一個 `<Text>` 元件
@@untranslatable_placeholder_b5ea89c4

segments.source_content: > `RNHighScores` is the name of your module that will be used when you add a view to React Native from within your iOS application.

translations.zh-hant: > `RNHighScores` 是您的模組名稱，當您從 iOS 應用程式中加入一個視圖到 React Native 時會使用到它。

segments.source_content: #### The Magic: `RCTRootView`

translations.zh-hant: #### 魔法：`RCTRootView`

segments.source_content: Now that your React Native component is created via `index.js`, you need to add that component to a new or existing `ViewController`. The easiest path to take is to optionally create an event path to your component and then add that component to an existing `ViewController`.

translations.zh-hant: 現在您的 React Native 元件已透過 `index.js` 建立，您需要將該元件加入到新的或現有的 `ViewController` 中。最簡單的方法是選擇性地建立一個通往您元件的事件路徑，然後將該元件加入到現有的 `ViewController` 中。

segments.source_content: We will tie our React Native component with a new native view in the `ViewController` that will actually contain it called `RCTRootView` .

translations.zh-hant: 我們將把 React Native 元件與一個新的原生視圖綁定，這個視圖在 `ViewController` 中實際包含它，稱為 `RCTRootView`。

segments.source_content: ##### 1. Create an Event Path

translations.zh-hant: ##### 1. 建立事件路徑

segments.source_content: You can add a new link on the main game menu to go to the "High Score" React Native page.

translations.zh-hant: 你可以在主遊戲選單上新增一個連結，導向「高分」的 React Native 頁面。

segments.source_content: ![Event Path](/docs/assets/react-native-add-react-native-integration-link.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![事件路徑](/docs/assets/react-native-add-react-native-integration-link.png)

segments.source_content: ##### 2. Event Handler

translations.zh-hant: ##### 2. 事件處理器

segments.source_content: We will now add an event handler from the menu link. A method will be added to the main `ViewController` of your application. This is where `RCTRootView` comes into play.

translations.zh-hant: 我們現在要從選單連結新增一個事件處理器。一個方法會被加入到應用程式的主 `ViewController` 中。這就是 `RCTRootView` 發揮作用的地方。

segments.source_content: When you build a React Native application, you use the [Metro bundler][metro] to create an `index.bundle` that will be served by the React Native server. Inside `index.bundle` will be our `RNHighScore` module. So, we need to point our `RCTRootView` to the location of the `index.bundle` resource (via `NSURL`) and tie it to the module.

translations.zh-hant: 當你建立一個 React Native 應用程式時，你會使用 [Metro 打包工具][metro] 來建立一個 `index.bundle`，這個檔案會由 React Native 伺服器提供。在 `index.bundle` 中會有我們的 `RNHighScore` 模組。因此，我們需要將 `RCTRootView` 指向 `index.bundle` 資源的位置（透過 `NSURL`），並將其與模組綁定。

segments.source_content: We will, for debugging purposes, log that the event handler was invoked. Then, we will create a string with the location of our React Native code that exists inside the `index.bundle`. Finally, we will create the main `RCTRootView`. Notice how we provide `RNHighScores` as the `moduleName` that we created [above](#the-react-native-component) when writing the code for our React Native component.

translations.zh-hant: 為了除錯目的，我們會記錄事件處理器被調用的情況。接著，我們會建立一個字串，包含存在於 `index.bundle` 中的 React Native 程式碼位置。最後，我們會建立主要的 `RCTRootView`。請注意我們如何提供 `RNHighScores` 作為 `moduleName`，這是我們在撰寫 React Native 元件程式碼時[上方](#the-react-native-component)所建立的。

segments.source_content: First `import` the `React` library.

translations.zh-hant: 首先 `import` `React` 函式庫。

segments.source_content:
```jsx
import React
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_d1a6eaaa

segments.source_content: > The `initialProperties` are here for illustration purposes so we have some data for our high score screen. In our React Native component, we will use `this.props` to get access to that data.

translations.zh-hant: > `initialProperties` 在這裡是為了示範用途，讓我們有一些資料給高分畫面使用。在我們的 React Native 元件中，我們會使用 `this.props` 來取得這些資料。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_9d31dc8f

segments.source_content: > Note that `RCTRootView bundleURL` starts up a new JSC VM. To save resources and simplify the communication between RN views in different parts of your native app, you can have multiple views powered by React Native that are associated with a single JS runtime. To do that, instead of using `RCTRootView bundleURL`, use [`RCTBridge initWithBundleURL`](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/react-native/React/Base/RCTBridge.h#94) to create a bridge and then use `RCTRootView initWithBridge`.

translations.zh-hant: > 注意 `RCTRootView bundleURL` 會啟動一個新的 JSC 虛擬機器。為了節省資源並簡化原生應用中不同部分的 RN 視圖之間的溝通，你可以有多個由 React Native 驅動的視圖，這些視圖與單一 JS 運行時相關聯。要做到這一點，不要使用 `RCTRootView bundleURL`，而是使用 [`RCTBridge initWithBundleURL`](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/react-native/React/Base/RCTBridge.h#94) 來建立一個橋接器，然後使用 `RCTRootView initWithBridge`。

segments.source_content: > When moving your app to production, the `NSURL` can point to a pre-bundled file on disk via something like `let mainBundle = NSBundle(URLForResource: "main" withExtension:"jsbundle")`. You can use the `react-native-xcode.sh` script in `node_modules/react-native/scripts/` to generate that pre-bundled file.

translations.zh-hant: > 當將應用程式移至生產環境時，`NSURL` 可以指向磁碟上的預打包檔案，例如 `let mainBundle = NSBundle(URLForResource: "main" withExtension:"jsbundle")`。你可以使用 `node_modules/react-native/scripts/` 中的 `react-native-xcode.sh` 腳本來產生這個預打包檔案。

segments.source_content: ##### 3. Wire Up
Wire up the new link in the main menu to the newly added event handler method.

translations.zh-hant: 將主選單中的新連結與新增的事件處理器方法連接起來。

segments.source_content: ![Event Path](/docs/assets/react-native-add-react-native-integration-wire-up.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![事件路徑](/docs/assets/react-native-add-react-native-integration-wire-up.png)

segments.source_content: > One of the easier ways to do this is to open the view in the storyboard and right click on the new link. Select something such as the `Touch Up Inside` event, drag that to the storyboard and then select the created method from the list provided.

translations.zh-hant: > 其中一個較簡單的方法是打開故事板中的視圖，然後右鍵點擊新連結。選擇類似 `Touch Up Inside` 的事件，將其拖曳到故事板，然後從提供的列表中選擇已建立的方法。

segments.source_content: ##### 3. Window Reference
Add a window reference to your AppDelegate.swift file. Ultimately, your AppDelegate should look something similar to this:

translations.zh-hant: 在你的 AppDelegate.swift 檔案中新增一個視窗參考。最終，你的 AppDelegate 應該看起來類似這樣：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_79d8cec2

segments.source_content: ### Test your integration

translations.zh-hant: ### 測試你的整合

segments.source_content: You have now done all the basic steps to integrate React Native with your current application. Now we will start the [Metro bundler][metro] to build the `index.bundle` package and the server running on `localhost` to serve it.

translations.zh-hant: 你現在已經完成了將 React Native 與當前應用程式整合的所有基本步驟。現在我們將啟動 [Metro 打包工具][metro] 來建立 `index.bundle` 套件，並啟動運行在 `localhost` 上的伺服器來提供它。

segments.source_content: ##### 1. Add App Transport Security exception

translations.zh-hant: ##### 1. 新增 App Transport Security 例外

segments.source_content: Apple has blocked implicit cleartext HTTP resource loading. So we need to add the following our project's `Info.plist` (or equivalent) file.

translations.zh-hant: Apple 已經封鎖了隱式的明文 HTTP 資源載入。因此，我們需要在專案的 `Info.plist`（或等效）檔案中新增以下內容。

segments.source_content:
```xml
<key>NSAppTransportSecurity</key>
<dict>
    <key>NSExceptionDomains</key>
    <dict>
        <key>localhost</key>
        <dict>
            <key>NSTemporaryExceptionAllowsInsecureHTTPLoads</key>
            <true/>
        </dict>
    </dict>
</dict>
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_e029f808

segments.source_content: > App Transport Security is good for your users. Make sure to re-enable it prior to releasing your app for production.

translations.zh-hant: > App Transport Security 對你的使用者有好處。確保在發布應用程式之前重新啟用它。

segments.source_content: ##### 2. Run the packager

translations.zh-hant: ##### 2. 執行封裝伺服器

segments.source_content: To run your app, you need to first start the development server. To do this, run the following command in the root directory of your React Native project:

translations.zh-hant: 要運行您的應用程式，首先需要啟動開發伺服器。為此，請在您的 React Native 專案根目錄下執行以下命令：

segments.source_content:
<Tabs groupId="package-manager" queryString defaultValue={constants.defaultPackageManager} values={constants.packageManagers}>
<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm start
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn start
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_a5021f4a

segments.source_content: ##### 3. Run the app

translations.zh-hant: ##### 3. 運行應用程式

segments.source_content: If you are using Xcode or your favorite editor, build and run your native iOS application as normal. Alternatively, you can run the app from the command line using following command from the root directory of your React Native project:

translations.zh-hant: 如果您使用 Xcode 或您喜愛的編輯器，請像平常一樣建置並運行您的原生 iOS 應用程式。或者，您也可以從 React Native 專案根目錄使用以下命令來運行應用程式：

segments.source_content:
<Tabs groupId="package-manager" queryString defaultValue={constants.defaultPackageManager} values={constants.packageManagers}>
<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm run ios
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn ios
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_0b9170d8

segments.source_content: In our sample application, you should see the link to the "High Scores" and then when you click on that you will see the rendering of your React Native component.

translations.zh-hant: 在我們的範例應用程式中，您應該會看到「高分榜」的連結，點擊後將看到您的 React Native 元件渲染結果。

segments.source_content: Here is the _native_ application home screen:

translations.zh-hant: 這是 _原生_ 應用程式的主畫面：

segments.source_content: ![Home Screen](/docs/assets/react-native-add-react-native-integration-example-home-screen.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![主畫面](/docs/assets/react-native-add-react-native-integration-example-home-screen.png)

segments.source_content: Here is the _React Native_ high score screen:

translations.zh-hant: 這是 _React Native_ 的高分榜畫面：

segments.source_content: ![High Scores](/docs/assets/react-native-add-react-native-integration-example-high-scores.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![高分榜](/docs/assets/react-native-add-react-native-integration-example-high-scores.png)

segments.source_content: > If you are getting module resolution issues when running your application please see [this GitHub issue](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/4968) for information and possible resolution. [This comment](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/4968#issuecomment-220941717) seemed to be the latest possible resolution.

translations.zh-hant: > 如果在運行應用程式時遇到模組解析問題，請參閱 [此 GitHub 議題](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/4968) 以獲取資訊和可能的解決方案。[此評論](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/4968#issuecomment-220941717) 似乎是目前最新的解決方案。

segments.source_content: ### Now what?

translations.zh-hant: ### 接下來呢？

segments.source_content: At this point you can continue developing your app as usual. Refer to our [debugging](debugging) and [deployment](running-on-device) docs to learn more about working with React Native.

translations.zh-hant: 此時您可以像平常一樣繼續開發您的應用程式。請參考我們的 [除錯](debugging) 和 [部署](running-on-device) 文件，以了解更多關於使用 React Native 的資訊。

segments.source_content: [metro]: https://metrobundler.dev/

translations.zh-hant: [metro]: https://metrobundler.dev/
